home.title: Lead Dev Freelance & CTO

home.description: I help startups and scale-ups structure, industrialize and deliver robust and scalable backends. EPITECH engineer with 8 years of experience including 7 as a freelancer.

projects.title: Projects & Missions

ciffreo.title: Ciffreo Bona
ciffreo.description: Modern backend architecture with Go & NestJS, OpenSearch integration, CI/CD pipelines and ERP connection. Latency divided by 2.
ciffreo.fullDescription: Legacy stack poorly maintainable with significant technical debt. Need for scalability and reliability to support growth with real-time synchronization of stock, products and orders.
mission: Modern backend architecture with Go & NestJS
Integration of high-performance search engine via OpenSearch in Go
Frontend development (Next.js)
Setup of CI/CD pipelines (Docker, GitHub Actions)
ERP API connection and stock system
Payment integration via PayXpert
Regular technical consulting to team and decision makers
challenges: Legacy stack poorly maintainable with significant technical debt
Lack of scalability and reliability to support growth
Need to synchronize stock, products and orders in real time
Complex integration with existing systems
achievements: Significant performance improvement (latency divided by 2)
Reliable production deployment without service interruption
Documented, modular and scalable stack
Productivity gain for internal team
learnings: Modern backend architecture with Go and NestJS

petpalz.title: PetPalz.io
petpalz.description: From scratch creation of a mobile-first platform for pet health management. NestJS/Go API, Flutter app, Next.js interface and PostgreSQL infrastructure.
petpalz.fullDescription: From scratch creation of a mobile-first platform for pet health management. Goal: support individuals and professionals (veterinarians, trainers) on the same solution with scalable and modular architecture.
mission: Design and development of robust backend API with NestJS and Go
Development of consumer mobile application with Flutter
Creation of professional-dedicated interface with Next.js
Setup of cloud architecture and PostgreSQL relational database
Configuration of CI/CD pipelines to automate deployments with docker swarm
Definition of product strategy and technical support for long-term vision
challenges: Scalable and modular architecture to support future evolutions
Management of individuals and professionals on the same solution
Marketplace, subscriptions, CRM and other evolution objectives
achievements: Launch of stable first version with first users
Smooth experience on client side and professional back-office
Infrastructure ready for opening to external partners
Solid technical foundation for adding new features
learnings: Product strategy and long-term technical vision

thales.title: Thales Digital Identity
thales.role: Technical Project Manager & Head of Solution Engineering
thales.description: High-sensitivity mission on strategic national project to secure digital health card. Multi-site coordination and critical work package management.
thales.fullDescription: High-sensitivity mission on a strategic national project to secure the digital health card, with strong requirements for confidentiality, integrity and regulatory compliance.
mission: Close collaboration with SESAM-Vitale teams
Delivery distributed across 3 sites: France, Czech Republic, Singapore
Management of critical technical and functional work packages
Technical supervision of teams (SEM role) and agile ritual animation
Direct interface between development, test, security and end client
Production of project documentation meeting administration standards
challenges: Multicultural, multi-timezone context
High security & quality requirements
Strong requirements for confidentiality and integrity
Strict regulatory compliance
Complex multi-site coordination
achievements: Secure delivery of key digital health card modules
Smooth and continuous coordination despite time zone differences
Structuring of inter-team exchanges and notable reduction of project friction
Improved client visibility and overall delivery management
learnings: Technical management in highly secure environment

woman.title: Woman & Luxury
woman.description: Launch of an unprecedented mobile application dedicated to fashion, combining social network, inspiration and content creation for an ambitious startup in the feminine luxury universe.
woman.fullDescription: Launch of an unprecedented mobile application dedicated to fashion, combining social network, inspiration and content creation for an ambitious startup in the feminine luxury universe. Build a complete and scalable technical stack for a consumer mobile product.
mission: Development of main API in NestJS, Go & orchestration via PM2
Design and development of ReactJS back-office for moderation and internal management
Creation of interface dedicated to content creators with Next.js
Setup and maintenance of microservices in Python and Go
Cloud architecture designed for scalability on Microsoft Azure
Complete tech project management (project leadership, roadmap, sprints, documentation)
Strategic consulting: stack choices, design system, GitHub / Bitbucket repo organization
Deployment automation with Docker, Jenkins and CI/CD integration
Product tracking via Jira and technical documentation on Confluence
challenges: Offer smooth experience to creators and users via multi-interface ecosystem
Structure project and technical management in early-stage startup environment
Manage complexity of consumer mobile product in luxury universe
achievements: Complete digital ecosystem delivered for first fundraising
Operational MVP with modular cloud infrastructure
Clear technical vision set for future platform evolutions
learnings: Azure cloud stack for consumer applications

plateforme.title: La Plateforme_
plateforme.role: Educational Manager Cybersecurity & Software Teaching Lead
plateforme.description: Educational manager for Cybersecurity Administrator, IP Network Technician and Software Developer programs. Mediterranean digital campus with free programs open to all.
plateforme.fullDescription: Educational manager for Cybersecurity Administrator, IP Network Technician and Software Developer programs. La Plateforme_: the Mediterranean digital campus with zero tuition fee programs, open to all talents.
mission: Creation and development of educational content
Student support
Student evaluation and follow-up
Management of smooth year progress
Technical reference
Setup of technical platform exams
Personal student follow-up
Program evolution through company feedback
Internal development of school technical infrastructure
challenges: Free programs open to all without resource and diploma conditions
Meeting place between companies and learners
Program adaptation to field needs
Management of students with very heterogeneous profiles
achievements: Cybersecurity Administrator, IP Network Technician and Software Developer operational programs
Technical equipment management and purchase (Server bay, switch, NVR recorder, etc.)
School technical infrastructure (Cloud, Local servers, premises connectivity)
Solid company partnerships for internships and jobs
learnings: Pedagogy adapted to varied technical profiles

kbrw.title: KBRW
kbrw.description: Global OMS solution integrating inventory management, distributed order orchestration for international large groups (Auchan, LVMH, PSA, Casino).
kbrw.fullDescription: Global OMS solution integrating inventory management, distributed order orchestration, omnichannel order management and customer relations. Robust, scalable and custom-made for international large groups.
mission: Sprint management and team coordination
Design and development of business tools (OMS/WMS) in Elixir, Node.js and React
Deployment via Jenkins, AWS integration, Riak database, SOLR search engine
Direct collaboration with clients and technical project management
challenges: Robust, scalable and custom solution
Fully mastered platform based on internally developed open source components
Strategic projects with international large groups
achievements: Delivery of critical solutions in production for international groups
Strengthening of system reliability and scalability
Client recognition on deliverable quality and project follow-up
learnings: Distributed architecture with Elixir for critical systems
Project management for international large accounts
Complete technical ecosystem (Elixir, React, AWS, Riak, SOLR)

nexen.title: Nexen Partners
nexen.description: Final studies internship at Nexen Partners, IT consulting firm. Strong cloud and network architecture project for public actors with SAMU.
nexen.fullDescription: Final studies internship at Nexen Partners, IT consulting firm focused on client and employee satisfaction. Strong cloud and network architecture project for public actors.
mission: Development of Python scripts for AWS deployment automation
Technical documentation writing for SAMU network architecture
Frontend POCs (ReactJS, VueJS) to accelerate client prototyping phases
challenges: National scale project
Complex network architecture for public actors
Comparison and prototyping of frontend technologies
achievements: Concrete contribution to national scale project
Improvement of client interface delivery speed
Clear and reusable documentation delivered for operational teams
learnings: Technical documentation for large scale projects
